Title: vLLM vulnerable to Regular Expression Denial of Service
Description: A recent review identified several regular expressions in the vllm codebase that are susceptible to Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS) attacks. These patterns, if fed with crafted or malicious input, may cause severe performance degradation due to catastrophic backtracking.
NotImpacted: All versions before 0.6.3, all versions starting from 0.9.0
